FAULT SOURCES
Row1 = fault code, fault name 
Row2 = dip strike rake top bottom
Row3 = Mmax, Mmaxsigma, seismic moment rate (Nm/yr), 0.5 2.0 = minimum moment rate 0.5*Morate maximum moment rate 2*Morate
Row4 = number of locations on fault surface
Row5+ = fault coordinates
